name: comment
content: // Comments are used document your code so it is easier for humans to understand. You should include a comment at the start of each function to explain what the function does, if it takes any arguments, and if it returns any values. It is also a good idea to comment any complex blocks of code so you, or another programmer, can more easily maintain or modify the code in the future.

examples.name: Example of comments with sprites

tips:
- You can type whatever you want on a comment line.
- You can comment out a block of statements using /\* before the first statement and \*/ after the last statement.
